name: Blackhawk Country Club
description: Blackhawk Country Club is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Blackhawk, CA. There are 6 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The courts can be reserved. The facility includes amenities like food, locker rooms, restrooms, water, youth programming, lights, a pro shop or equipment store, trainers or lessons, wheelchair accessibility, and adaptive programming. A membership is required to play.

name: Club Sport San Ramon
description:
ClubSport offers its members 4 pickleball courts on Tennis Court 1, with permanent lines and 4 mobiles nets. Rackets and balls are available on site for Pickleball play.

ClubSport offers drop-in classes for beginners and intermediate players. Check the Tennis Court 1 schedule for class meeting times. Or train one-on-one with a Certified Pickleball Coach to improve your game.

name: Iron Horse Gym
description:
Sunday Afternoons: November 2023 - June 2024 (Resumes November 2024)

Please pay online prior to participating in open gym to reduce wait time to enter. Please show payment receipt (paper of digital) when you enter in the facility .  All participants and guest must pay the entry fee during Open Gym in order to enter in the facility. 

NO CASH will be accepted, Admission to the open gym program is credit card only or Active Membership Pass.
